title: COZY KISS Waterproof Pet Blanket, Soft Faux Fur Throw Blanket for Sofa Bed Couch, Liquid Pee Proof Throw for Large Dog or Cat, Reversible Washable Plush, Double Sided, 50x60 in, Brown Deer Print
features: SUPER SOFT BLANKET: COZY KISS faux fur throw blanket are softer and warmer than other flannel blankets, Specially for both you and your pets. It also helps prevent unwanted pet hair and fur on sofas, chairs, beds, car seats. Internal waterproof lining provides defense and stops liquids from seeping through. NOTE: The surface of the fiber itself is not waterproof

DOUBLE SIDED: The front is made of 400GSM faux fur. The higher the GSM value, the better the thermal insulation performance, So our insulation value is higher than other ordinary blankets. The reverse side is made of 230GSM milk velvet, which is more skin-friendly and breathable than sherpa fabric, and can resist pilling and wear. It can also be used to cover your pet to sleep. Blankets are suitable for ALL SEASONS

LEAKPROOF PROTECTION: The inside of the blanket is coated with a waterproof TPU layer, which protects your furniture from stains and urine. Perfect for dogs and cats, this versatile blanket is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, so this blanket can be used as both a pet blanket and a pet mat.This blanket not only protects your furniture from chewing and scratching, but also protects your car backseat

PERFECT GIFT: The fluffy fabric makes the blanket lightweight, making it very convenient for you to carry the blanket and pet travel. At the same time, we have different sizes, both leopard print and elk styles are very decorative. You can give them as gifts to your family and friends on Mother's Day, Father's Day, Christmas, and other holidays. It is an excellent travel blanket, dog box pad, and dog house pad, which is a must-have for pet owners

EASY TO CARE: These blankets can be MACHINE WASHED below 86℉. Soft materials cannot withstand high temperatures, so please Dry at LOW TEMPERATURES, do NOT IRON, and do NOT BLEACH. Please put the blanket in a laundry mesh bag to prevent entanglement and damage. Note: There may be a slight odor upon unpacking due to packaging. A gentle wash at 86℉ will resolve this
description: Product Description COZY KISS Faux Fur Throw Blanket is Softer and Warmer than Flannel Blanket This blanket can be used as a winter warm blanket for HUMANS or as a leak-proof blanket for Pets.
